name: Street Rats: Mischief in the City
name_original: Street Rats: Mischief in the City
description:
Street Rats: Mischief in the City is a scrappy little scavenger game about surviving the city and gathering food for the mischief of rats who live there, allowing the player to fend for themselves in a different perspective while surviving the challenges that face them!

Using the basic directional keys to move, your job is to collect as much food as you can while making your way through the city.
